sentences.en: For the time being, however, immunotherapy is still in its experimental stages.
sentences.cn: 但免疫疗法目前仍处于实验阶段。

sentences.en: He is, like most theorists, out there in left field, ignoring the experimental evidence.
sentences.cn: 一如大多数理论家般，他想法古怪，行事出人意表，竟对实验得来的证据置之不理。

sentences.en: He tends to write bizarre and highly experimental pieces of music.
sentences.cn: 他倾向于创作高度试验性而且风格奇异的音乐作品。

sentences.en: Her poems are modishly experimental in style and recondite in subject-matter.
sentences.cn: 她的诗在风格上是时髦的实验派，主题艰深难懂。

sentences.en: Nuclear physics has provided extensive experimental support for the mass - energy equivalence.
sentences.cn: 原子核物理学已经为质能等效性提供了广泛的实验证据.

sentences.en: The British Sports Minister is reported to be ready to argue for an experimental lifting of the ban.
sentences.cn: 据报道，英国体育大臣准备争取试行取消那条禁令。

sentences.en: The experimental farm is near the waterpower station.
The problem is that digital transmission is still only experimental.
sentences.cn: 问题是数字传播还只是在试验阶段.

sentences.en: The state farm assigned the experimental plot to that group.
sentences.cn: 国营农场把试验田划给这个小组负责.

sentences.en: The technique is experimental, but the list of its practitioners is growing.
sentences.cn: 这种技术是试验性的，但是采用它的人正在增加。

sentences.en: They can serve as markers to check the effectiveness of experimental treatments.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质还可以作为检测实验治疗有效性的标识物.

sentences.en: They worked hard every day to keep their experimental plot up.
sentences.cn: 他们天天埋头苦干,以把试验田种好.

sentences.en: This trip will be only experimental.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行只是试验性的.

sentences.en: We have experimental and observational evidence concerning things which happened before and after the origin of life.
sentences.cn: 有关生命起源前后发生了什么，我们通过实验和观察得出了一些证据。

sentences.en: Yesterday he changed his tune, saying the fare increase was experimental.
sentences.cn: 昨天他变卦了，说提价只是试行。

words.tran_cn: 实验上；用实验方法；实验式地
实验；试验；实验法；实验过程

phrases.tran_cn: 实验装置；实验仪器；实验器具
实验条件，试验条件；实验情境

trans.tran_en: used for, relating to, or resulting from experiments
